title: cat
content:
Get ready to party withÂ **FIFA Mobile 22 Carniball**! Celebrate this colorful event in style with players from Brazil, France, Italy, Germain, Spain, and around the world.

## Parade

Play 5 Skill Games every day to earn Carniball Points. Spend Carniball Points in the Carniball Rewards Chapter.

![FIFA Mobile 22 Carniball Skill Games in Parade Chapter](https://www.fifamobileguide.com/wp-content/uploads/2022/02/fifa-mobile-22-carniball-skill-games.jpg?ezimgfmt=rs:600x253/rscb1/ng:webp/ngcb1)

| Type         | Reward           |
| ------------ | ---------------- |
| Skill Game 1 | 10 Parade Points |
| Skill Game 2 | 10 Parade Points |
| Skill Game 3 | 10 Parade Points |
| Skill Game 4 | 30 Parade Points |
| Skill Game 5 | 30 Parade Points |

Skill Games refreshes daily
